sentences.english: The bans only affect planned caesareans, not c-sections which are carried out for emergency reasons.
sentences.chinese: 该禁令只有计划的剖腹产，紧急的剖腹产不列。

sentences.english: The bans only affect planned caesareans, not c-sections which are carried out for emergency reasons.
sentences.chinese: 该禁令只有计划的剖腹产，紧急的剖腹产不列。

sentences.english: You have had 2 cesareans before, but you have also had a vaginal delivery.
sentences.chinese: 你有两次剖腹产，但也有一次顺产经历。

sentences.english: At 30 weeks, Mrs. Goodrich had an emergency caesarean.
sentences.chinese: 第30周时，古德里奇太太进行了人工剖腹产。

sentences.english: A recent study finds C-sections may be a contributing to babies being born too early.
sentences.chinese: 最近一项研究发现剖腹产使婴儿过早出生。

sentences.english: After surgical intervention the fetal sheep continued on its gestation.
sentences.chinese: 术后母绵羊继续妊娠，待足月后行剖腹产取胎羊。

sentences.english: Abortion and caesarian section are widely used for non - medical or non - lifesaving reasons.
sentences.chinese: 堕胎和剖腹产手术被广泛地用于非医或非救生的原因。

sentences.english: And if a natural birth would pose a health risk for mother or baby, a c-section would be allowed.
sentences.chinese: 如果顺产会威胁母婴健康，允许进行剖腹产。

sentences.english: You don't have a reason for a cesarean in this pregnancy, such as a placenta previa.
sentences.chinese: 你这次怀孕没有必须剖腹产的指证，如胎盘前置。

sentences.english: Du Li, 2-time Olympic shooting gold medalist, gave caesarean birth to a son Sunday in Jinan.
sentences.chinese: 8月8日，两届奥运射击冠军杜丽在济南剖腹产子。

sentences.english: She had no alternative option but to go to hospital for a Caesarian section.
sentences.chinese: 她没有办法就去医院剖腹产了。

sentences.english: Its survey showed China's C-section rate is 46%, the world's highest.
sentences.chinese: 报告称中国剖腹产率达到46%，位居世界第一。

sentences.english: And if a natural birth would pose a health risk for mother or baby, ac-section would be allowed.
sentences.chinese: 如果顺产会威胁母婴健康，允许进行剖腹产。

sentences.english: She was to have a cesarean-section the next day. It would be her first child.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，她将接受剖腹产手术，迎来她的第一个孩子。

sentences.english: I was not yet 38 weeks, when symptoms do Caesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 我是在38周还没有出现症状的时候去做的剖腹产。

sentences.english: Of that percent increase, 92% were delivered cesarean.
sentences.chinese: 在这10%的早产儿中，92%是生于剖腹产。

definition: to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to cut open the abdomen/to disembowel/to speak from the heart
expected date of childbirth/estimated due date (EDD)
